QuestData.Title: Not Our Purple Elves
QuestData.Description:
Ye know, $n, these elves might be purple, but they're no' with the Alliance.
Leastwise, they're a lot more aggressive than this ol' Dark Iron is comfortable with.
On the off chance it'll piss off the Horde, ye mind killin' a few of them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 8 Horde forces on the eastern shores of Xibala.
